review: Works better then I expected.  Now I have Netflix on the go.

review: I was a little skeptical at first..but after i installed it and watch a few minutes of it ...i am a big believer in internet tv.Awesome ..fire stick tv rocks.!!!

review: Small,  neat, easily installed. Great picture quality and slot of movie, applications options.
